text: Khloe Kardashian and Tristan Thompson have been having relationship issues ever since the NBA star was busted cheating on the reality star back in April. Now, rumors are circulating that Khloe has been banned from attending Cleveland Cavaliers games. The rumor originated from a report by Media Take Out.
